Header: Indian Delegation on Tour Goes to Upcountry
Content: The visiting Indian tri-service delegation, comprised of 159 personnel as part of their itinerary visited Elephant Orphanage at Pinnawala and Sri Dalada Maligawa on Sunday (16). Those Indian tri-servicemen with their spouses arrived in Sri Lanka on Saturday (15) on a reciprocal Army to Army expedition, came into effect as a concept of the Commander of the Army. The visitors are expected to leave Sri Lanka on Tuesday (18). Major General Tissa Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division accompanied the delegation during their visit in Kandy.
